mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_work_oper ( id, oper_user_id , work_id , ou_id , operation_id , status , is_admin_assign , create_time , last_modify_time , created_id , modified_id , operator_id ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{operUserId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{workId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{operationId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{status,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{isAdminAssign,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_work_oper SET oper_user_id = #{operUserId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , work_id = #{workId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , operation_id = #{operationId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , status = #{status,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , is_admin_assign = #{isAdminAssign,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id}
